description: Zed Business Layer - Facade: The method `Spryker\Zed\Api\Business\ApiFacade::getApiRouter()()` is using an invalid return type `\Symfony\Component\Routing\RouterInterface` which violates the rule "Every Facade should only return native types or transfer objects."
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `value` in method `Spryker\Zed\Api\Dependency\Service\ApiToUtilEncodingServiceBridge::encodeJson()`.
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `options` in method `Spryker\Zed\Api\Dependency\Service\ApiToUtilEncodingServiceBridge::encodeJson()`.
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `depth` in method `Spryker\Zed\Api\Dependency\Service\ApiToUtilEncodingServiceBridge::encodeJson()`.
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `jsonValue` in method `Spryker\Zed\Api\Dependency\Service\ApiToUtilEncodingServiceBridge::decodeJson()`.
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `assoc` in method `Spryker\Zed\Api\Dependency\Service\ApiToUtilEncodingServiceBridge::decodeJson()`.
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `depth` in method `Spryker\Zed\Api\Dependency\Service\ApiToUtilEncodingServiceBridge::decodeJson()`.
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `options` in method `Spryker\Zed\Api\Dependency\Service\ApiToUtilEncodingServiceBridge::decodeJson()`.
